title: Ezan Vakti Pro - Azan, Prayer Times, & Quran
summary: Islamic Utility apps, The Holy Quran, Adhan times and more function.
description: ***Another first new feature:    PRAYER ON TIME: Prayer constantly reminds. Until you say OK.‚úî Ramadan 2017 Special Module.‚úî Warning in Times Athan .‚úî Reminder before entering Times .‚úî Automatic mute Times .‚úî I'm Praying Mode. (Automatic call rejection. Sending SMS)‚úî Based on your location from GPS ( satellite ) time to calculate .‚úî Religious Objects Or Monthly downloads a month with their ability to work without internet .‚úî 2 cities to add.‚úî Wake Saher .‚úî Reminder fasting Monday to Thursday‚úî Friday Prayer Reminder ( Interchangeable with short sound sela )‚úî The Fellowship of Prayer .‚úî All the Qur'an. Voice.‚úî Hatim Online Sharing ( Verse , Time , Page, Juz Based) .‚úî Read verses autofocus to follow .‚úî Hijri Day and Month .‚úî tracking auto accident‚úî Qibla Compass .‚úî Qiblah Map.‚úî Find nearby mosque (Google Service )‚úî Alerts multiple audio options for options .‚úî separately for each prayer time and to select the sound .‚úî Feature Wake up to the morning prayer . (Plus or minus 2 minutes, 3 minutes , etc.) .‚úî 17 languages support.‚úî Automatic work in the background‚úî Downloadable content has been minimized with the program size.MEMORY PROBLEMS DUE TO MARKET *** installation fails, you can find and install the classic version .** Important Note: The application is moved to SD card widget NOT WORK **
descriptionHTML:
***Another first new feature:
PRAYER ON TIME: Prayer constantly reminds. Until you say OK.

✔ Ramadan 2017 Special Module.
✔ Warning in Times Athan .
✔ Reminder before entering Times .
✔ Automatic mute Times .
✔ I'm Praying Mode. (Automatic call rejection. Sending SMS)
✔ Based on your location from GPS ( satellite ) time to calculate .
✔ Religious Objects Or Monthly downloads a month with their ability to work without internet .
✔ 2 cities to add.
✔ Wake Saher .
✔ Reminder fasting Monday to Thursday
✔ Friday Prayer Reminder ( Interchangeable with short sound sela )
✔ The Fellowship of Prayer .
✔ All the Qur'an. Voice.
✔ Hatim Online Sharing ( Verse , Time , Page, Juz Based) .
✔ Read verses autofocus to follow .
✔ Hijri Day and Month .
✔ tracking auto accident
✔ Qibla Compass .
✔ Qiblah Map.
✔ Find nearby mosque (Google Service )
✔ Alerts multiple audio options for options .
✔ separately for each prayer time and to select the sound .
✔ Feature Wake up to the morning prayer . ( High -volume sounds)
✔ Library .
✔ Sheriffs century .
✔ for Tesbihat . ( Related Objects automatically switched)
✔ Arabic amulet .
✔ The amulet of Turkish Meal and Transkiripsiyo .
✔ Prayer of Supplication And Time
✔ Hijri calendar converter.
✔ Weather
✔ Online tracking Kaaba .
✔ 5-Year Important Religious Day And Night.
✔ Amel Book App
✔ Religious available at the site of countries, cities and Counties .
✔ place closely for Non minutes plus or minus deviation from a selected location to set the minutes . (Plus or minus 2 minutes, 3 minutes , etc.) .
✔ 17 languages support.
✔ Automatic work in the background
✔ Downloadable content has been minimized with the program size.


MEMORY PROBLEMS DUE TO MARKET *** installation fails, you can find and install the classic version .

** Important Note: The application is moved to SD card widget NOT WORK **
comments: The best azan app on marshmallow till now ,because it has a custom alarm time befor azan and  a custom alarm tone befor the azan ,but i need to make the alarms tones befor tha azan to be also added from my sd card not to be only downloaded

excellent behtareen jazakAllah before 2 weeks use start kia. or itni achi lagi app k her friends relatives k phone me yehi app install kar k day raha hota hoon. or mashwara bhi isy ka deta hoon. bohot achi app hai. please isme duaaen bhi add kar dain jazakAllah ‚ù§ üëåüëç
Great work. It helps me a lot in reminding me about my prayer üòÜ
It's qiblah compass should be made simple, so that other small android can make use of it. Anyway it's been a good app. Jazaakumullahu Khaira.
Mengingatkan kita akan sholat dan waktunya d masing2 wilayah akurat
Programi kullanirken cikan reklamlara dikkat edilmeli! Ayrica ekran goruntuleri iletebilirim.
